message: Let's split it evenly and be done with it!
I'll give you a small share, but I'm keeping most of the cash!
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but you'll still get a decent chunk!

You're really lowballing me now, Alice. I'm taking a bigger share, but I'll give you a slightly smaller one this time.
